trans-unit.source: Provides support for programmatically invoking XML Web services discovery.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce il supporto per la chiamata a livello di programmazione di individuazione dei servizi Web XML.

trans-unit.source: XML Web service discovery is the process of locating, or discovering, one or more related documents that describe available XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: Individuazione del servizio Web XML è il processo di individuazione, o individuazione di uno o più documenti correlati che descrivono i servizi Web XML.

trans-unit.source: It is through XML Web services discovery that XML Web service clients learn about the available XML Web services at a given URL and how to use them.
trans-unit.target: È tramite l'individuazione di servizi Web XML che i client del servizio Web XML informazioni sui servizi Web XML disponibili in un determinato URL e sul loro utilizzo.

trans-unit.source: XML Web services discovery works from the premise that you have already obtained the URL to a discovery document, possibly through a directory service, such as http://uddi.microsoft.com, however, you do not have the details about the XML Web services offered.
trans-unit.target: Funzionamento di individuazione Servizi Web XML dal presupposto di aver già ottenuto l'URL di un documento di individuazione, eventualmente tramite un servizio di directory, ad esempio http://uddi.microsoft.com, tuttavia, non si dispone di informazioni dettagliate sui servizi Web XML offerti.

trans-unit.source: Through XML Web services discovery, you can discover the details about the XML Web services listed in a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> at a specific URL.
trans-unit.target: Tramite l'individuazione di servizi Web XML, è possibile individuare i dettagli sui servizi Web XML elencati un <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>in un URL specifico.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>

trans-unit.source: An XML Web service client starts XML Web services discovery by supplying a URL to either the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Un client del servizio Web XML avvia individuazione dei servizi Web XML specificando un URL al metodo di <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this URL refers to a discovery document, which in turn refers to documents that describe one or more XML Web services, which are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: In genere, questo URL fa riferimento a un documento di individuazione, che a sua volta fa riferimento a documenti che descrivono uno o più servizi Web XML, che vengono aggiunti al <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: At that point, only that document is downloaded and verified to point to valid information about XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: A questo punto, solo tale documento viene scaricato e verifica che puntino a informazioni valide sui servizi Web XML.

trans-unit.source: However, the references contained in that document are not verified at this stage.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, i riferimenti contenuti in tale documento non vengono verificati in questa fase.

trans-unit.source: Instead they are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Vengono invece aggiunti per il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: To verify that the references are valid, invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods, which add valid referenced documents to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per verificare che i riferimenti sono validi, richiamare il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>metodi, che aggiungono documenti di riferimento validi per il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Last, if a client wants to save the discovery results to disk, invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Infine, se si desidera salvare i risultati dell'individuazione su disco, richiamare il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If programmatic access to XML Web services discovery is not needed, the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] ships the Web Services Discovery tool (Disco.exe) for discovering XML Web services within a command prompt.
trans-unit.target: Se non è necessario l'accesso programmatico all'individuazione dei servizi Web XML, il [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] viene fornito lo strumento di individuazione dei servizi Web (Disco.exe) per l'individuazione dei servizi Web XML all'interno di un prompt dei comandi.

trans-unit.source: For more details, see [Web Services Discovery Tool (Disco.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/acd88078-c581-42bc-94ca-6633e2851979).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [strumento di individuazione Servizi Web (Disco.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/acd88078-c581-42bc-94ca-6633e2851979).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets information in addition to references found in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene informazioni oltre ai riferimenti trovato nel documento di individuazione.

trans-unit.source: The AdditionalInformation property primarily contains SOAP bindings, represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding> class, defined in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà AdditionalInformation contiene principalmente associazioni SOAP, rappresentate dal <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding>definita nel documento di individuazione.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SoapBinding>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> containing additional information found in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IList>contenente ulteriori informazioni, vedere il documento di individuazione.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Discovers the supplied URL to determine if it is a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Consente di individuare l'URL fornito per determinare se si tratta di un documento di individuazione.

trans-unit.source: The Discover method expects that the supplied URL is a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Discover prevede che l'URL specificato è un documento di individuazione.

trans-unit.source: If the URL refers to a service description or an XML schema an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se l'URL fa riferimento a una descrizione del servizio o uno schema XML viene generata un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: To discover an XML schema or a service description invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per individuare uno schema XML o una descrizione del servizio di richiamare il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the supplied URL points to a valid discovery document, the discovery document at the supplied URL is added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se l'URL specificato punta a un documento di individuazione valido, il documento di individuazione all'URL specificato viene aggiunto per il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>insieme.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, references within the discovery document are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection, but not verified to point to valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, vengono aggiunti i riferimenti all'interno del documento di individuazione per il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>raccolta, ma non si verifica in modo da puntare a documenti di individuazione valido.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: To verify the references, point to valid discovery documents to invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per verificare i riferimenti, puntare a documenti di individuazione validi per richiamare il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL where XML Web services discovery begins.
trans-unit.target: L'URL in cui inizia l'individuazione dei servizi Web XML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> containing the results of XML Web services discovery at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"> </xref> contenente i risultati dell'individuazione dei servizi Web XML dall'URL fornito.

trans-unit.source: Accessing the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: Accesso all'URL specificato ha restituito un codice di stato HTTP diversi da <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>

trans-unit.source: The url parameteris a valid URL, but does not point to a valid discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Il url parametro è un URL valido, ma non punta a un documento di individuazione valido.

trans-unit.source: Discovers the supplied URL to determine if it is a discovery document, service description or an XML Schema Definition (XSD) schema.
trans-unit.target: Consente di individuare l'URL fornito per determinare se si tratta di un documento di individuazione, descrizione del servizio o uno schema di XML Schema Definition (XSD).

trans-unit.source: The DiscoverAny method discovers whether the supplied URL is a discovery document, service description or XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo DiscoverAny rileva se l'URL specificato è un documento di individuazione, una descrizione del servizio o uno schema XSD.

trans-unit.source: If it is known that the URL only refers to a discovery document, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> method might be invoked.
trans-unit.target: Se è noto che l'URL fa riferimento solo a un documento di individuazione, il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>metodo può essere richiamato.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the supplied URL points to a valid discovery document, XSD schema, or service description, the discovery document at the supplied URL is added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: Se l'URL specificato punta a un documento di individuazione valido, uno schema XSD o descrizione del servizio, il documento di individuazione all'URL specificato viene aggiunto per il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>raccolte.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the supplied URL refers to an XSD schema or Service Description a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> is created in memory and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'URL specificato fa riferimento a uno schema XSD o descrizione del servizio un <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>in memoria viene aggiunta per il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>raccolte.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, references within the discovery document are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection, but not verified to point to valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, vengono aggiunti i riferimenti all'interno del documento di individuazione per il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>raccolta, ma non si verifica in modo da puntare a documenti di individuazione valido.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: To verify that references point to valid discovery documents, invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per verificare che i riferimenti puntino ai documenti di individuazione validi, richiamare il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>o <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL where XML Web services discovery begins.
trans-unit.target: L'URL in cui inizia l'individuazione dei servizi Web XML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"></xref> containing the results of XML Web services discovery at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument"> </xref> contenente i risultati dell'individuazione dei servizi Web XML dall'URL fornito.

trans-unit.source: If the url parameter refers to a service description or an XSD Schema, a is created in memory for it.
trans-unit.target: Se il url parametro fa riferimento a una descrizione del servizio o uno Schema XSD, una viene creato in memoria.

trans-unit.source: Accessing the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: Accesso all'URL specificato ha restituito un codice di stato HTTP diversi da <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>

trans-unit.source: The url parameteris a valid URL, but does not point to a valid discovery document, service description, or XSD schema.
trans-unit.target: Il url parametro è un URL valido, ma non puntare a un documento di individuazione valido, la descrizione di servizio o uno schema XSD.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di documenti di individuazione.

trans-unit.source: The Documents collection is populated during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta documenti viene popolata durante le chiamate per il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: During invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods, if the supplied URL is a valid discovery document, that document is added to the Documents collection.
trans-unit.target: Durante le chiamate per il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>metodi, se l'URL specificato è un documento di individuazione valido, il documento viene aggiunto alla raccolta documenti.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: During invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods, valid discovery document references in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> collection are added to the Documents collection.
trans-unit.target: Durante le chiamate per il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>metodi, cui fa riferimento nel documento di individuazione valido di <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>raccolta vengono aggiunti alla raccolta documenti.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection"></xref> representing the collection of discovery documents found.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection"> </xref> che rappresenta la raccolta documenti di individuazione trovati.

trans-unit.source: Downloads the discovery document at the supplied URL into a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: Scarica il documento di individuazione all'URL fornito in un <xref:System.IO.Stream>oggetto.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the discovery document to download.
trans-unit.target: L'URL del documento di individuazione per il download.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> containing the document at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.IO.Stream>contenente il documento nell'URL fornito.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The download from the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: Il download dall'URL specificato ha restituito un codice di stato HTTP diversi da <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>

trans-unit.source: Downloads the discovery document at the supplied URL into a object, setting the contentType parameter to the MIME encoding of the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Scarica il documento di individuazione all'URL fornito in un oggetto impostando il contentType parametro per la codifica MIME del documento di individuazione.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the discovery document to download.
trans-unit.target: L'URL del documento di individuazione per il download.

trans-unit.source: The MIME encoding of the downloaded discovery document.
trans-unit.target: La codifica MIME del documento di individuazione scaricato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> containing the document at the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.IO.Stream>contenente il documento nell'URL fornito.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The download from the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: Il download dall'URL specificato ha restituito un codice di stato HTTP diversi da <xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.HttpStatusCode>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of exceptions that occurred during invocation of method from this class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di eccezioni che si è verificato durante la chiamata del metodo da questa classe.

trans-unit.source: The Errors collection is populated with exceptions that occurred during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta di errori viene popolata con le eccezioni che si sono verificati durante le chiamate per il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary> is cleared on invocation of these methods.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary>è deselezionata nella chiamata di questi metodi.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary"></xref> of exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary"> </xref> delle eccezioni.

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"></xref> object to load any external references.
trans-unit.target: Indica il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol"> </xref> oggetto per caricare i riferimenti esterni.

trans-unit.source: Reads in a file containing a map of saved discovery documents populating the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*> properties, with discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions referenced in the file.
trans-unit.target: Legge un file contenente una mappa di popolamento di documenti di individuazione salvati il <> </> *> e <> </> *> le proprietà, con i documenti di individuazione, gli schemi XML Schema Definition (XSD) e le descrizioni dei servizi a cui fa riferimento nel file.

trans-unit.source: A file containing a map of saved discovery documents can be created by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A> method or Disco.exe.
trans-unit.target: Un file contenente una mappa di documenti di individuazione salvato può essere creato dal <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A>metodo o Disco.exe.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `topLevelFilename` parameter must include the fully qualified path if the file does not exist in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: Il `topLevelFilename` parametro deve includere il percorso completo se il file non esiste nella directory corrente.

trans-unit.source: Name of file to read in, containing the map of saved discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Nome del file da leggere, contenente la mappa di salvare documenti di individuazione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection"></xref> containing the results found in the file with the map of saved discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection"> </xref> contenente i risultati nel file con il mapping di documenti di individuazione.

trans-unit.source: The file format is a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile> class serialized into XML; however, one would typically create the file using only the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll*> method or Disco.exe.
trans-unit.target: Il formato di file è un <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile>classe serializzato in XML; tuttavia, in genere viene creato il file utilizzando solo il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll*>metodo o Disco.exe.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll*> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile>

trans-unit.source: A collection of references founds in resolved discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di riferimenti trovati nei documenti di individuazione risolti.

trans-unit.source: The References collection is populated during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta dei riferimenti viene popolata durante le chiamate per il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: During invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods, if the supplied URL is a valid discovery document, that document is added to the References collection together with references found in the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: Durante le chiamate per il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>metodi, se l'URL specificato è un documento di individuazione valido, il documento viene aggiunto alla raccolta di riferimenti con riferimenti rilevati nel documento di individuazione.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: References added during invocations to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> methods are not necessarily valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: I riferimenti aggiunti durante le chiamate per il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A>metodi non sono documenti di individuazione necessariamente valido.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover%2A>

trans-unit.source: During invocations to <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> references within the References collection are verified as being valid discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Durante le chiamate a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>vengono verificati i riferimenti all'interno della raccolta di riferimenti come documenti di individuazione validi.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If they are valid and contain references, they are also added to the References collection.
trans-unit.target: Se sono validi e contenere riferimenti, vengono aggiunti anche per la raccolta dei riferimenti.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientReferenceCollection"></xref> of references discovered.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientReferenceCollection"> </xref> di riferimenti individuati.

trans-unit.source: Resolves all references to discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*> property, as well as references found in referenced discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Risolve tutti i riferimenti ai documenti di individuazione, gli schemi XML Schema Definition (XSD) e le descrizioni di servizio nel <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>proprietà, nonché i riferimenti trovati nei documenti di individuazione a cui fa riferimento.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>

trans-unit.source: ResolveAll resolves all valid references it finds and places them in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ResolveAll risolve tutti validi i riferimenti individua e li inserisce nel <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both ResolveAll and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> download and verify XSD schemas and service descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Entrambi ResolveAll e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>scaricare e verificare gli schemi XSD e le descrizioni in servizi di <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the two methods differ in how they handle discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, i due metodi diversi nella modalità di gestione documenti di individuazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolves all references in discovery documents within the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property; if a discovery document contains references to other discovery documents, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> resolves just those discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>risolve tutti i riferimenti nei documenti di individuazione all'interno di <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>proprietà; se un documento di individuazione contiene riferimenti ad altri documenti di individuazione, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>risolve solo i documenti di individuazione.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A></xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Discovery documents found in those discovery documents nested one level deep are not resolved by <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>; whereas ResolveAll resolves them all.
trans-unit.target: Documenti di individuazione trovati nei documenti di individuazione annidati a un livello di profondità non vengono risolti dalla <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>; mentre ResolveAll vengono risolti tutti.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: ResolveAll continues to resolve references in nested discovery documents until there are no more references.
trans-unit.target: ResolveAll continua a risolvere i riferimenti in documenti di individuazione nidificati fino a quando non sono presenti più riferimenti.

trans-unit.source: Errors occurring during the verification process done by ResolveAll are not thrown at the time of occurrence, but rather collected and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Gli errori rilevati durante il processo di verifica eseguito da ResolveAll non generati al momento dell'occorrenza, ma piuttosto raccolti e aggiunto al <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resolves all references to discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas and service descriptions in <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>, as well as references found in those discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Risolve tutti i riferimenti ai documenti di individuazione, gli schemi XML Schema Definition (XSD) e le descrizioni di servizio in <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>, nonché riferimenti trovati nei documenti di individuazione.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References*>

trans-unit.source: ResolveOneLevel resolves all valid references it finds and places them in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ResolveOneLevel risolve tutti validi i riferimenti individua e li inserisce nel <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> and ResolveOneLevel download and verify XSD schemas and service descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Entrambi <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>ResolveOneLevel scaricare e verificare gli schemi XSD e relative descrizioni del servizio e il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the two methods differ in how they handle discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, i due metodi diversi nella modalità di gestione documenti di individuazione.

trans-unit.source: ResolveOneLevel resolves all references in discovery documents within the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ResolveOneLevel risolve tutti i riferimenti nei documenti di individuazione all'interno di <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a discovery document contains references to other discovery documents, ResolveOneLevel resolves just those discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: Se un documento di individuazione contiene riferimenti ad altri documenti di individuazione, ResolveOneLevel risolve solo i documenti di individuazione.

trans-unit.source: Discovery documents found in those discovery documents nested one level deep are not resolved by ResolveOneLevel; whereas <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> resolve them all.
trans-unit.target: Documenti di individuazione trovati nei documenti di individuazione annidati a un livello di profondità non vengono risolti dalla ResolveOneLevel; mentre <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>risolverli tutti.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> continues to resolve references in nested discovery documents until there are no more references.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>continua a risolvere i riferimenti in documenti di individuazione nidificati fino a quando non sono presenti più riferimenti.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Errors occurring during the verification process done by ResolveOneLevel are not thrown at the time of occurrence, but rather collected and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Errori che si verificano durante il processo di verifica eseguito da ResolveOneLevel non generati al momento dell'occorrenza, ma piuttosto raccolti e aggiunti il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A>

trans-unit.source: Writes all discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and Service Descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*> property to the supplied directory and creates a file in that directory.
trans-unit.target: Scrive tutti i documenti di individuazione, gli schemi XML Schema Definition (XSD) e le descrizioni di servizio nel <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*>proprietà per la directory specificata e crea un file in tale directory.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*>

trans-unit.source: The file created with the name of the `topLevelFilename` parameter in the directory specified by the directory parameter contains a map of saved discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas and service descriptions.
trans-unit.target: Il file creato con il nome di `topLevelFilename` parametro nella directory specificata dal parametro directory contiene una mappa dei documenti di individuazione salvati, gli schemi XML Schema Definition (XSD) e le descrizioni dei servizi.

trans-unit.source: This file can be read in using the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A> method to populate the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Questo file può essere letto utilizzando il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A>metodo per popolare il <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format of the file is XML containing an serialized version of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile> class.
trans-unit.target: Il formato del file in formato XML che contiene una versione serializzata della <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile>classe.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile>

trans-unit.source: If a file exists with the same name as the `topLevelFilename` parameter in the `directory` parameter, that file is overwritten by the WriteAll method.
trans-unit.target: Se esiste un file con lo stesso nome di `topLevelFilename` parametro il `directory` parametro, tale file viene sovrascritto dal metodo WriteAll.

trans-unit.source: The `topLevelFilename` parameter must include the fully qualified path if the file does not exist in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: Il `topLevelFilename` parametro deve includere il percorso completo se il file non esiste nella directory corrente.

trans-unit.source: The directory in which to save all documents currently in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*> property.
trans-unit.target: La directory in cui salvare tutti i documenti attualmente nel <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to create or overwrite containing a map of all documents saved.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del file da creare o sovrascrivere contenente una mappa di tutti i documenti salvati.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection"></xref> containing the results of all files saved.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection"> </xref> contenente i risultati di tutti i file salvati.
